description: In this course, students will read the works, meet, and interview various literary writers that the Writers’ Centre and Presidential Speakers Series bring during the semester. Students will analyse the works of various writers visiting campus as well as those visiting the Singapore Writers Festival (November 1-9), and possibly those visiting The Ubud Writers’ Fesitval in Bali. Where curricular conflicts don’t arise, and as allowable, the class will attend various readings, lectures, and panel discussions at The SWF and possibly Ubud.
title: Living Authors
